verbose_text: The reporter assay showed that miR-125a reduces luciferase activity in cells transfected with reporters containing the WT 3'UTR of IRF4, which is abrogated by disruption of the proximal seed sequence (302-309 bp) in the unique seed sequence in the IRF4 3'UTR.
evidence: IRF4, which is abrogated by disruption of the proximal seed sequence (302-309 bp
